name: Rite of Dispatch
description: During this Round, the next Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura used by the character to which this is attached will cost 2 less Elemental Dice.
descriptionraw: During this Round, the next <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14082]</color> used by the character to which this is attached will cost 2 less Elemental Dice.
descriptionreplaced: During this Round, the next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color> used by the character to which this is attached will cost 2 less Elemental Dice.
